an5.178:1.2: api nu tumhehi dittham va sutam va:
an5.178:1.4: Tamenam rajano gahetva panatipata veramanihetu hananti va bandhanti va pabbajenti va yathapaccayam va karonti’”ti?
an5.178:1.7: Mayapi kho etam, bhikkhave, neva dittham na sutam:
an5.178:1.9: Tamenam rajano gahetva panatipata veramanihetu hananti va bandhanti va pabbajenti va yathapaccayam va karonti’ti.
an5.178:1.10: Api ca khvassa tatheva papakammam pavedenti:
an5.178:1.11: ‘ayam puriso itthim va purisam va jivita voropesiti.
an5.178:1.12: Tamenam rajano gahetva panatipatahetu hananti va bandhanti va pabbajenti va yathapaccayam va karonti.
an5.178:1.13: Api nu tumhehi evarupam dittham va sutam va’”ti?

an5.178:5.7: Mayapi kho etam, bhikkhave, neva dittham na sutam:
an5.178:5.9: Tamenam rajano gahetva suramerayamajjapamadatthana veramanihetu hananti va bandhanti va pabbajenti va yathapaccayam va karonti’ti.
an5.178:5.10: Api ca khvassa tatheva papakammam pavedenti:
an5.178:5.11: ‘ayam puriso suramerayamajjapamadatthanam anuyutto itthim va purisam va jivita voropesi;
an5.178:5.12: ayam puriso suramerayamajjapamadatthanam anuyutto gama va aranna va adinnam theyyasankhatam adiyi;
an5.178:5.13: ayam puriso suramerayamajjapamadatthanam anuyutto paritthisu parakumarisu carittam apajji;
an5.178:5.14: ayam puriso suramerayamajjapamadatthanam anuyutto gahapatissa va gahapatiputtassa va musavadena attham pabhanjiti.
